DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Semisheer Glitter - Electric Orange (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Amerikan Body Art Electric Orange Cosmetic Glitter is a combination of UV Glitter and multi color glitter (Holographic) polyester glitter with a fantastic opaque finish in a bright, blacklight reactive color, ideal for facepainting, glitter eyeliner, and glitter tattoos. Opaque Holographic Jewels glitter adds color and a bold finish to your face paint design. If you want the face paint to show through, please use sheer and semi sheer glitter instead. All of Amerikan Body Arts polyester glitter is made from hexagonal .008 sized polyester glitter and is safe for use on body and face. Amerikan Body Art Electric Orange Glitter is made in the USA and comes in a 0.5 or 2 ounce container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Polyester glitter is made from hexagonal 008 sized polyester
